track.name: Mary's in India
comments: this is my favourite song by her... first album I ever really bought for myself, I was 9 and I got it Christmas 2003 aha :)
Love the mix of the vocals and music on this one!!
one of my all time favorites <3
I love the back tap and I think no inuendo about it...her implication is quite clear

It's not his warped mind at all. Dido has even confirmed live what the subject of the song is (If I recall correctly, it's on her Brixton Academy DVD) Her best friend is actually called Mary, and the song was born when Mary went to India. However, it grew from there into fictional territory. She even said if it were true, it would make her a total bitch, so she's glad it's not :P
I've always loved this song very much.
One of the best Dido songs indeed : )
what a lyric this song has!
I just love the innuendo in her voice on the last line... "and he's taking care of me !". Or is that just my warped mind ?
